title: Our Animal Friends at Maple Hill Farm
description: Meet the animals of Maple Hill Farm and learn about their antics as they bring joy, laughter, and life to the people who live in a house that needs painting at the end of a road full of holes.Two dogs, five horses, a pig, some geese, lots of chickens, a few cows, a few goats, several sheep, and four special catsâ€”these are the animals at Maple Hill Farm.With simple text that is both affectionate and wry, and irresistible illustrations that burst with personality, Alice and Martin Provensen bring their barnyard friends to life for the delight of animal lovers both young and old.
author: Alice Provensen
